title: If I have my 12th boards in February 2021, can I apply for NDA 1 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you will give 12th boards in February 2021 then you are in 11th class definitely. I personally feel you should not apply for NDA1 2020 because you have not completed your class 11 syllabus , and the syllabus for Nda has both the combination of 11and 12. So , prepare from now , if possible complete your syllabus of 11th till January and start doing 12 th maths syllabus . It increase your speed as well as your confidence Now coming to your question it depends on your DOB.

You can give if your DOB falls under the criteria but after clearing exam you will not be allowed to give SSB . However , i think you should give exam because it will prepare you for next exam , you will be able to handle stress in exam after going through the process also if you go through a process once it will be easy for you next time . I also gave my NDA1 2019 exam while studying in 12 th backlog and i was not able to make through but then i gave NDA2 and i cleared my exam and i have got my AFSB centre at Gandhinagar . Hope it helps.
